import "./App.css"; import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import QRgen from "./pages/QRgenerator"; import QRscan from "./pages/QRscanner"; import Login from "./pages/Login"; import ProductVerify from "./pages/ProductVerify"; import Register from "./pages/Register"; import CodeVerify from "./pages/CodeVerify"; import AddProduct from "./pages/AddProduct"; import Result from "./pages/Result"; import ProductVerifyFail from "./pages/ProductVerifyFail"; import Transaction from "./pages/Transaction"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { logout } from "./actions/userActions"; function App() { const userSignin = useSelector((state) => state.userSignin); const { userInfo } = userSignin; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const signoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; return (
